text: Carol Carstairs, interviewed by Passon and Tong for the second time, began by agreeing that she could have been mistaken about the precise minute of Dackson's visit the previous Wednesday, and ended by admitting that he was in fact at least half an hour late for his appointment with her. "There it is," Passon commented afterwards. "She is a business woman.
